thread.title: Emirates plane creates beautiful heart shaped cloud
thread.title_full: Emirates plane creates beautiful heart shaped cloud

title: Emirates plane creates beautiful heart shaped cloud
text:
Emirates plane creates beautiful heart shaped cloud Last updated 08:57, October 9 2015 YOUTUBE/SCREENGRAB 
Jet stream from an Emirates aircraft created a heart-shape in the clouds. 
Emirates Airlines have shown their true love for travel after one of their aircraft's created a love-heart in the clouds. 
The spectacular battle of nature verses machine was captured as the flight descended into Birmingham airport in the UK. 
As the plane comes in, the jet stream causes the clouds to swirl in the shape of a big heart in the sky. 
&amp;amp;amp;nbsp; 
"The sheer size of this plane means it virtually creates its own weather systems as its wings generate huge pressure differences around themselves," the YouTube post said.
